Class RoomBooking

  • java.lang.Object
    • RoomBooking
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<RoomBooking>

    public class RoomBooking
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<RoomBooking>
    Representation of a booking on a single day. This class includes methods for booking-to-booking comparisons and overlaps, which is its primary functional purpose.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int duration
      Duration of the booking, in hours.
      (package private) static int[] fastOverlapFields
      We use these fields to determine if two bookings cannot overlap.
      (package private) java.util.Calendar startTime 
      (package private) java.lang.String title 
      (package private) java.lang.String user 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RoomBooking(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String title, java.util.Calendar startTime, int duration)
      Constructs a new room booking with a given owner, title, the starting time and booking length in hours.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compareTo(RoomBooking other)
      Compares two room bookings based solely on their starting time.

    • Field Detail

      • fastOverlapFields

        static final int[] fastOverlapFields
        We use these fields to determine if two bookings cannot overlap. If any of these differ between them, we assume the bookings are disjoint.

      • user

        java.lang.String user

      • title

        java.lang.String title

      • startTime

        java.util.Calendar startTime

      • duration

        int duration
        Duration of the booking, in hours.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RoomBooking

        public RoomBooking(java.lang.String user,
           java.lang.String title,
           java.util.Calendar startTime,
           int duration)
        Constructs a new room booking with a given owner, title, the starting time and booking length in hours.
        Parameters:
        user - Owner of the booking.
        title - Title for the booking.
        startTime - Starting time for the booking.
        duration - Duration of the booking in hours.

    • Method Detail

      • overlaps

        public boolean overlaps(RoomBooking other)
        Checks if two bookings overlap.
        Parameters:
        other - Booking to check against.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the bookings overlap.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Converts booking to a suitable format for output, compliant to assignment spec. We override Object.toString(), since it is *the* method designed for this particular purpose. Creating a .describeSelf() is semantically invalid.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(RoomBooking other)
        Compares two room bookings based solely on their starting time.
